title: £10for £25 Worth of Indian Food For Two at Balti King
highlights:
• £25 worth of fresh Indian food for two people
  • Extensive menu of balti, tandoori, tikka dishes and house specials
  • Hyde Park location near the centre of Leeds

title: £8 for 90 Minute Track Hire for a Racing Experience at Tockwith Circuit with Tockwith Motorsports (£20 Value)
highlights:
• Training area comprises junctions, roundabouts and traffic lanes
  • Suitable for all beginners
  • Driver Training lasts up to 90 minutes
